export var AvatarStyleCount={face:10,nose:10,mouth:10,eyes:10,eyebrows:10,glasses:10,hair:30,accessories:10,details:10,beard:10};export var CompatibleAgents=['quark','micromessenger','weibo','douban'];export var PalettePreset=['#fa541c','#faad14','#fadb14','#a0d911','#52c41a','#1890ff','#2f54eb','#722ed1','#eb2f96','#bfbfbf'];export var DefaultBackgroundConfig={color:'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0)',shape:'none'};export var ShapeStyleMapping={circle:'rounded-full',square:'rounded-lg',none:''};export var SVGFilter="<defs>
  <filter id="filter" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%" filterUnits="objectBoundingBox" primitiveUnits="userSpaceOnUse" color-interpolation-filters="linearRGB">
    <feMorphology operator="dilate" radius="20 20" in="SourceAlpha" result="morphology"/>
    <feFlood flood-color="#ffffff" flood-opacity="1" result="flood"/>
    <feComposite in="flood" in2="morphology" operator="in" result="composite"/>
    <feMerge result="merge">
          <feMergeNode in="composite" result="mergeNode"/>
      <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" result="mergeNode1"/>
      </feMerge>
  </filter>
</defs>";
